dct_title_s: Nouvelle mappe monde dedièe au progrès de nos connoissances
dct_description_sm: Date of publication from Tooley. Double hemispherical world map showing the unmapped east coast of Australia. Relief shown pictorially. Map is framed by illustrations. Includes text below map. Probably from: Vol. 1, no. 2. Atlas universel dressé sur les meilleures cartes modernes. Venise : Remondini, 1776-[1784]. Paolo Santini sold the plates of his Atlas universel to G. Remondini in 1781. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: A Venise : Par Franc̦ois Santini ... ; Chez Mr. Remondini, approximately 1784.
A Venise : par Franc̦ois Santini ... ; chez Mr. Remondini, ca. 1784.
